Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition at Jackson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier track conditions near Jackson.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
